00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00033 #define Alloca(n, t)   (t *) alloca( (size_t) ( (n) * sizeof(t) ) )

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00215 static R_INLINE double*
00216 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00217 {
00218     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00219     return dest;
00220 }
00221 
00231 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00232 {
00233     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00234     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00235     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00236 }

00246 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00247 {
00248     double ans = 0;
00249     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00250     return ans;
00251 }

00262 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00263 {
00264     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00265 }

00282 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
00283 {
00284     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
00285     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
00286     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
00287         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
00288                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
00289                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
00290     return 0;
00291 }

00305 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
00306 {
00307     int ll;
00308 
00309     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
00310         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
00311                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
00312     return 0;
00313 }

00328 static double
00329 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00330               int n, int vTyp)
00331 {
00332     double ans = 0.;
00333     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00334         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00335         double ri = yi - mui;
00336         switch(vTyp) {
00337         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00338             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00339             break;
00340         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00341             ans += 2 * wi *
00342                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00343             break;
00344         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00345             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00346             break;
00347         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00348             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00349             break;
00350         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00351             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00352             break;
00353         default:
00354             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00355         }
00356     }
00357     return ans;
00358 }
00359 
00372 static void
00373 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int lTyp)
00374 {
00375     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00376         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00377         switch(lTyp) {
00378         case 1:         /* logit */
00379             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00380             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00381             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00382             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00383             break;
00384         case 2:         /* probit */
00385             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00386                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00387                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00388             }
00389             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00390                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00391                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00392             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00393             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00394             break;
00395         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00396             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00397             break;
00398         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00399             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00400             break;
00401         case 5:         /* identity */
00402             mu[i] = eta[i];
00403             muEta[i] = 1.;
00404             break;
00405         case 6:         /* log */
00406             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00407             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00408                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00409             break;
00410         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00411             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00412             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00413             break;
00414         default:
00415             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00416         }
00417     }
00418 }
00419 
00430 static void
00431 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00432 {
00433     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00434         double mui = mu[i];
00435         switch(vTyp) {
00436         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00437             var[i] = 1.;
00438             break;
00439         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00440             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00441                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00442                       mu, i);
00443             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00444             break;
00445         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00446             if (mui <= 0)
00447                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00448             var[i] = mui;
00449             break;
00450         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00451             if (mui <= 0)
00452                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00453             var[i] = mui * mui;
00454             break;
00455         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00456             if (mui <= 0)
00457                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00458             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00459             break;
00460         default:
00461             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00462         }
00463     }
00464 }
00465         
00476 static void
00477 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
00478          const double *X, int nc)
00479 {
00480     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
00481     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
00482     R_CheckStack();
00483 
00484     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
00485         AZERO(tmp, m);
00486         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00487             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00488                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
00489         }
00490         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
00491     }
00492 }
00493 
00502 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00503 {
00504     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00505     int nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00506     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00507         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00508         double *st = REAL(STi);
00509         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00510         int ncp1 = nci + 1;
00511 
00512         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00513             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00514         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00515             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00516                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00517     }
00518     return pars;
00519 }
00520 
00534 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00535 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00536 {
00537     int ans = 0, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00538 
00539     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00540         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00541         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00542 
00543         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00544         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00545         nc[i] = nci;
00546         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00547     }
00548     return ans;
00549 }
00550 
00562 static R_INLINE int
00563 theta_S_ind(int i, int nf, int *Gp, int *nlev, int *spt)
00564 {
00565         int trm = Gp_grp(i, nf, Gp);
00566         return (spt[trm] + (i - Gp[trm]) / nlev[trm]);
00567 }
00568 
00580 static void Tt_Zt(CHM_SP A, int *Gp, int *nc, int *nlev, double **st, int nf)
00581 {
00582     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int *)(A->p);
00583     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), one[] = {1,0};
00584 
00585     for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00586         for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1];) {
00587             int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00588             
00589             if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00590             else {
00591                 int nr = p;     /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00592                 while ((ai[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00593                 nr -= p;        /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00594                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00595                                 one, st[i], nc + i, ax + p, &nr);
00596                 p += (nr * nc[i]);
00597             }
00598         }
00599 }
00600 
00601 /* Level-1 utilties that call at least one of the stand-alone utilities */
00602 
00609 static double lmm_update_fixef_u(SEXP x)
00610 {
00611     double ans = NA_REAL;
00612     if (!V_SLOT(x) && !MUETA_SLOT(x)) { /* linear mixed model */
00613         int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1;
00614         int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00615         double *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x),
00616             *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
00617             *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x), *RX = RX_SLOT(x),
00618             *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00619             *u = U_SLOT(x), *wy = (double*)NULL, *y = Y_SLOT(x),
00620             dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
00621             mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00622         CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00623         CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00624         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00625         R_CheckStack();
00626         
00627         if (sXwt) {             /* Replace X and y by weighted X and y */
00628             WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
00629             wy = Calloc(n, double);
00630             
00631             AZERO(WX, n * p);
00632             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00633                 wy[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
00634                 for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
00635                     WX[i + j * n] += sXwt[i] * X[i + j * n];
00636             }
00637             X = WX;
00638             y = wy;
00639         }
00640                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
00641         P_sdmult(u, (int*)L->Perm, A, y, 1);
00642         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
00643         Memcpy(u, (double*)sol->x, q);
00644         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00645                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
00646         F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n,
00647                         y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
00648         F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, RZX, &q,
00649                         u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
00650         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, RX, &p, fixef, &i1);
00651         d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
00652             - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
00653         if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
00654             error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
00655                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00656         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, fixef, &i1);
00657         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
00658                         fixef, &i1, one, u, &i1);
00659         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00660             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00661         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00662         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00663 
00664         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00665         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00666         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
00667             dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
00668         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
00669             dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
00670         d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00671                               (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : dn));
00672         d[sigmaREML_POS] = d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt(dn/dnmp);
00673 
00674         if (wy) Free(wy);
00675         if (WX) Free(WX);
00676         ans = d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
00677     }
00678     return ans;
00679 }
00680 
00686 static void update_A(SEXP x)
00687 {
00688     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
00689     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p),
00690         *zi = (int*)(Zt->i), *zp = (int*)(Zt->p), ncmax,
00691         nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00692     int annz = ap[A->ncol], znnz = zp[Zt->ncol];
00693     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00694     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00695         *zx = (double*)(Zt->x);
00696     R_CheckStack();
00697 
00698     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00699 
00700     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
00701         Memcpy(ax, zx, znnz);
00702     } else { /* Only for nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00703         AZERO(ax, annz);        /* Initialize potential nonzeros to 0 */
00704         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00705             int pa = ap[j];
00706             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00707                 while (ai[pa] < zi[p]) pa++;          /* matching pos in A */
00708                 if (ai[pa] != zi[p])
00709                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and A structures, j = %d"), j);
00710                 ax[pa] = zx[p];
00711             }
00712         }
00713     }
00714                                 /* When T != I multiply A on the left by T' */
00715     if (ncmax > 1) Tt_Zt(A, Gp, nc, nlev, st, nf);
00716                                 /* Multiply A on the left by S */
00717     for (int p = 0; p < annz; p++) {
00718         int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00719         ax[p] *= st[i][((ai[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00720     }
00721 }
00722 
00733 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00734 {
00735     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00736     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00737     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00738         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
00739         *pwt = PWT_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00740         *var =  VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00741     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00742     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00743     R_CheckStack();
00744     
00745     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00746         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00747         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00748             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1.0) / (var ? var[j] : 1.0));
00749             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00750             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00751         }
00752     }
00753     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00754         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p;
00755         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00756         CHM_SP C = A;
00757 
00758         for (int j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00759             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00760                 int ja = i + j * n;
00761                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00762                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) * (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00763             }
00764         }
00765         if (cx) {               /* C is a scaled version of A */
00766             for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00767                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00768                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00769             A->x = (void*)cx;
00770         } else {
00771             int *ci, *cp;
00772             C = Cm_SLOT(x);
00773             R_CheckStack();
00774 
00775             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00776             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00777             for (int j = 0; j < s; j++)
00778                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00779                     int ja = i + j * n, pc;
00780                     for (int pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00781                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00782                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00783                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00784                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00785                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00786                     }
00787                 }
00788             A = C;
00789         }
00790     }
00791     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00792         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00793               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00794 
00795     d[ldL2_POS] = M_chm_factor_ldetL2(L);
00796     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00797     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00798                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00799     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00800         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00801     return d[pwrss_POS];
00802 }
00803 
00813 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00814 {
00815     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00816     int i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00817     int ns = n * s;
00818     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = ETA_SLOT(x),
00819         *etaold = (double*) NULL, *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00820         *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),
00821         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
00822         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00823     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00824     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00825     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00826     R_CheckStack();
00827 
00828     if (V) {
00829         etaold = eta;
00830         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00831     }
00832                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00833     for (int i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00834                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00835     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one, X_SLOT(x), &ns,
00836                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, one, eta, &i1);
00837                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00838     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00839     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00840     R_CheckStack();
00841     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00842         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00843     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00844 
00845     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00846         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00847             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00848         int *gdims;
00849         
00850         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00851             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00852         for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00853             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00854                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00855             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00856                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00857                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00858             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00859         }
00860         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00861         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00862             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00863         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00864         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00865             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00866         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00867         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00868             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00869                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00870                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00871                                  * pnames has been checked */
00872         Free(eta);
00873         eta = etaold;
00874         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00875         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00876         UNPROTECT(1);
00877     }
00878 
00879     if (muEta) {
00880         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00881         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00882     } else {
00883         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00884     }
00885 
00886     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00887     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00888         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00889         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00890     }
00891                                 /* store u'u */
00892     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00893     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00894     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00895                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00896     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00897         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00898     return d[pwrss_POS];
00899 }
00900 
00909 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00910 {
00911     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
00912     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00913     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00914     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00915     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00916     R_CheckStack(); 
00917 
00918     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00919                                 /* inverse permutation */
00920     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
00921     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00922         for (int k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00923             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00924             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i];
00925             for (int kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00926         }
00927         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00928             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, one,
00929                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00930         }
00931     }
00932 }
00933 
00942 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
00943 {
00944     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), info;
00945     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00946     double *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00947         *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x), *RX = RX_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
00948         *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x),
00949         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00950     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00951     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00952     CHM_DN cRZX = N_AS_CHM_DN(RZX, q, p), ans;
00953     R_CheckStack();
00954 
00955     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
00956         WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
00957 
00958         AZERO(WX, n * p);
00959         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
00960             for (int k = 0; k < s; k++)
00961                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00962                     WX[i + j * n] +=
00963                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
00964         X = WX;
00965         /* Replace A by C, either just the x component or the entire matrix */
00966         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
00967         else {
00968             A = Cm_SLOT(x);
00969             R_CheckStack();
00970         }
00971     }
00972                                 /* solve L %*% RZX = PAW^{1/2}GHX */
00973     P_sdmult(RZX, (int*)L->Perm, A, X, p); /* right-hand side */
00974     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRZX, &c); /* solution */
00975     Memcpy(RZX, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
00976     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
00977                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
00978     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, RX, &p); /* X'X */
00979     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, RZX, &q, one, RX, &p);
00980     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, RX, &p, &info);
00981     if (info)
00982         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), info);
00983                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
00984     d[ldRX2_POS] = 0;
00985     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(RX[j * (p + 1)]);
00986 
00987     if (WX) Free(WX);
00988     return d[ML_POS];
00989 }
00990 
00991 /* Level-2 utilities that call at least one of the level-1 utilities */
00992 
01000 static void
01001 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
01002 {
01003     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS], pos = 0;
01004     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01005     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01006     R_CheckStack();
01007 
01008     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01009                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
01010     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01011         int nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
01012         double *sti = st[i];
01013 
01014         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
01015             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
01016         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
01017             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01018                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
01019     }
01020     update_A(x);
01021 }
01022 
01032 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
01033 {
01034     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01035     int i, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01036     double *Cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
01037         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x),
01038         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
01039         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
01040     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
01041         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01042     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01043     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
01044         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
01045     CHM_SP C = Cm_SLOT(x);
01046     R_CheckStack();
01047     
01048     if (!sXwt) return(0);       /* nothing to do for LMMs */
01049     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
01050     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
01051     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
01052         C = A_SLOT(x);
01053         R_CheckStack();
01054         C->x = (void*)Cx;
01055     }
01056     
01057     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01058      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01059      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01060      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01061     AZERO(u, q);
01062     update_mu(x);
01063     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01064         
01065         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01066         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01067                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01068         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01069         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01070         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01071                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01072         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01073                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01074         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01075             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01076         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01077         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01078                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01079         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01080         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01081                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01082         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01083             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01084         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01085         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01086 
01087         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01088             for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01089             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01090             if (verb < 0)
01091                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01092                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01093             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01094                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01095                 break;
01096             }
01097         }
01098         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01099     }
01100     return i;
01101 }
01102 
01103 /* Level-3 utilities that call at least one level-2 utilities */
01104 
01116 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma, double *fvals, double *rvals)
01117 {
01118     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01119     int i1 = 1, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01120     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01121         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01122     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01123     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01124     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01125     R_CheckStack();
01126 
01127     if (V || muEta) {
01128         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01129     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01130         update_L(x);
01131         update_RX(x);
01132         lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01133                                 /* Update beta */
01134         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01135         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, del2, &i1);
01136         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01137                                 /* Update u */
01138         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01139         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
01140                         del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01141         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01142         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01143         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01144         update_mu(x);        /* and parts of the deviance slot */
01145     }
01146     Memcpy(fvals, fixef, p);
01147     if (rvals) {
01148         update_ranef(x);
01149         Memcpy(rvals, RANEF_SLOT(x), q);
01150     }
01151 }
01152 
01160 /* FIXME: Probably should fold this function into MCMC_S */
01161 static void MCMC_T(SEXP x, double sigma)
01162 {
01163     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), nf = (DIMS_SLOT(x))[nf_POS];
01164     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01165     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01166     R_CheckStack();
01167 
01168     if (ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev) < 2) return;
01169     error("Code for non-trivial theta_T not yet written");
01170 }
01171 
01179 static void MCMC_S(SEXP x, double sigma)
01180 {
01181     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01182     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i),
01183         *ap = (int*)(A->p), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
01184     int annz = ap[A->ncol], info, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS],
01185         nf = dims[nf_POS], ns, p = dims[p_POS], pos,
01186         q = dims[q_POS], znnz = ((int*)(Zt->p))[Zt->ncol];
01187     double *R, *ax = (double*)(A->x), *b = RANEF_SLOT(x),
01188         *eta = ETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),  
01189         *rr, *ss, one = 1, *u = U_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x);
01190     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
01191         *spt = Alloca(nf + 1, int);
01192     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01193     R_CheckStack();
01194 
01195     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01196     ns = 0;                     /* ns is length(theta_S) */
01197     spt[0] = 0;                 /* pointers into ss for terms */
01198     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01199         ns += nc[i];
01200         spt[i + 1] = spt[i] + nc[i];
01201     }
01202 
01203     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
01204         Memcpy(ax, (double*)(Zt->x), znnz);
01205     } else error("Code not yet written for MCMC_S with NLMMs");
01206                                 /* Create T'Zt in A */
01207     Tt_Zt(A, Gp, nc, nlev, st, nf); 
01208                                 /* Create P'u in ranef slot */
01209     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
01210                                 /* Create X\beta + offset in eta slot */
01211     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01212     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &n, &p, &one, X_SLOT(x), &n,
01213                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, &one, eta, &i1);
01214                                 /* Allocate R, rr and ss */
01215     R = Alloca(ns * ns, double); /* crossproduct matrix then factor */
01216     rr = Alloca(ns, double);     /* row of model matrix for theta_S */
01217     ss = Alloca(ns, double);     /* right hand side, then theta_S */
01218     R_CheckStack();
01219     AZERO(R, ns * ns);
01220     AZERO(ss, ns);
01221     /* Accumulate crossproduct from pseudo-data part of model matrix */
01222     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
01223         int sj = theta_S_ind(i, nf, Gp, nlev, spt);
01224         AZERO(rr, ns);
01225         rr[sj] = b[i];
01226         F77_CALL(dsyr)("U", &ns, &one, rr, &i1, R, &ns);
01227     }   
01228     /* Accumulate crossproduct and residual product of the model matrix. */
01229     /* This is done one row at a time.  Rows of the model matrix
01230      * correspond to columns of T'Zt */
01231     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) { /* jth column of T'Zt */
01232         AZERO(rr, ns);
01233         for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++) {
01234             int i = ai[p];      /* row in T'Zt */
01235             int sj = theta_S_ind(i, nf, Gp, nlev, spt);
01236 
01237             rr[sj] += ax[p] * b[i];
01238             ss[sj] += rr[sj] * (y[j] - eta[j]);
01239         }
01240         F77_CALL(dsyr)("U", &ns, &one, rr, &i1, R, &ns);
01241     }
01242     F77_CALL(dposv)("U", &ns, &i1, R, &ns, ss, &ns, &info);
01243     if (info)
01244         error(_("Model matrix for theta_S is not positive definite, %d."), info);
01245     for (int j = 0; j < ns; j++) rr[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01246     /* Sample from the conditional Gaussian distribution */
01247     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &ns, R, &ns, rr, &i1);
01248     for (int j = 0; j < ns; j++) ss[j] += rr[j];
01249     /* Copy positive part of solution onto diagonals of ST */
01250     pos = 0;
01251     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01252         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
01253             st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] = (ss[pos] > 0) ? ss[pos] : 0;
01254             pos++;
01255         }
01256     }
01257     update_A(x);
01258 }
01259 
01260 /* Externally callable functions */
01261 
01270 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
01271 {
01272     double one[] = {1, 0};
01273     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
01274     CHM_FR L;
01275     R_CheckStack();
01276 
01277     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
01278     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01279         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01280               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01281 
01282     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
01283 }
01284 
01293 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP fm)
01294 {
01295     SEXP devsamp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym);
01296     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), nsamp = LENGTH(devsamp);
01297     int n = dims[n_POS], np = dims[np_POS],
01298         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01299     double
01300         *STsamp = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)),
01301         *d = DEV_SLOT(fm), *dev = REAL(devsamp),
01302         *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym),
01303         *fixsamp = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *resamp = RANEF_SLOT(x);
01304 
01305     GetRNGstate();
01306     /* The first column of storage slots contains the fitted values */
01307     for (int i = 1; i < nsamp; i++) {
01308 /* FIXME: This is probably wrong for a model with weights. */
01309         if (sig)                /* update and store sigma */
01310             sig[i] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq((double)(n + q)));
01311                         /* update L, RX, beta, u, eta, mu, res and d */
01312         MCMC_beta_u(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, fixsamp + i * p,
01313                     resamp + (resamp ? i : 0) * q); 
01314         dev[i] = d[ML_POS];
01315                                 /* update theta_T, theta_S and A */
01316         MCMC_T(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1);
01317         MCMC_S(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1);
01318         ST_getPars(fm, STsamp + i * np); /* record theta */
01319     }
01320     PutRNGstate();
01321                 /* Restore pars from the first columns of the samples */
01322     ST_setPars(fm, STsamp);
01323     Memcpy(FIXEF_SLOT(fm), fixsamp, p);
01324     update_u(fm, 0);
01325     update_L(fm);
01326     update_RX(fm);
01327     lmm_update_fixef_u(fm);
01328     update_ranef(fm);
01329 
01330     return x;
01331 }
01332 
01342 SEXP 
01343 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01344 {
01345     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01346     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), verb = asInteger(verbp);
01347     int lmm = !(MUETA_SLOT(x) || V_SLOT(x)), nf = dims[nf_POS];
01348     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01349     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01350     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01351     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01352     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01353     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01354         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01355     R_CheckStack();
01356 
01357     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01358     if (!lmm) {
01359         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01360 
01361         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01362         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01363         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01364         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01365     }
01366                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01367     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01368     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01369                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01370     for (int i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01371         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01372     }
01373                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01374     for (int i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01375         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01376         for (int j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01377         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01378     }
01379     do {
01380         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and A */
01381 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01382  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01383  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01384  * zero. */
01385         if (lmm) {
01386             update_L(x);
01387             update_RX(x);
01388             fx = lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01389         } else {
01390             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01391             update_u(x, verb);
01392             mer_update_dev(x);
01393             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01394         }
01395         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01396     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01397     update_RX(x);
01398     lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01399     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01400     return R_NilValue;
01401 }
01402 
01411 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
01412 {
01413     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01414     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01415     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
01416     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
01417     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
01418     CHM_DN dm1;
01419     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01420     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
01421         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01422     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01423     R_CheckStack();
01424 
01425     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01426     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
01427     sc = dims[useSc_POS] ?
01428         (DEV_SLOT(x)[dims[isREML_POS] ? sigmaREML_POS : sigmaML_POS]) : 1;
01429     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01430         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
01431         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
01432                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
01433                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
01434 
01435         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
01436         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
01437         for (int j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
01438         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
01439             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
01440         for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
01441             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
01442             for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
01443                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
01444             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
01445             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
01446             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
01447             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
01448             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
01449             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
01450             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
01451             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
01452             if (nc[i] > 1) {
01453                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
01454                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
01455                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
01456                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
01457             }
01458         }
01459         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
01460     }
01461     UNPROTECT(1);
01462     return ans;
01463 }
01464 
01472 SEXP mer_ST_chol(SEXP x)
01473 {
01474     SEXP ans = PROTECT(duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)));
01475     int ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
01476     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01477     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01478     R_CheckStack();
01479 
01480     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ans, Gp_SLOT(x), st, nc, nlev);
01481     for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
01482         if (nc[k] > 1) {        /* nothing to do for nc[k] == 1 */
01483             int nck = nc[k], nckp1 = nc[k] + 1;
01484             double *stk = st[k];
01485 
01486             for (int j = 0; j < nck; j++) {
01487                 double dd = stk[j * nckp1]; /* diagonal el */
01488                 for (int i = j + 1; i < nck; i++) {
01489                     stk[j + i * nck] = dd * stk[i + j * nck];
01490                     stk[i + j * nck] = 0;
01491                 }
01492             }
01493         }
01494     }
01495 
01496     UNPROTECT(1);
01497     return ans;
01498 }
01499 
01507 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
01508 {
01509     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
01510     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
01511 
01512     UNPROTECT(1); 
01513     return ans;
01514 }
01515 
01525 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
01526 {
01527     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
01528         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
01529         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)), nf = LENGTH(ST);
01530     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
01531         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
01532     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
01533         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
01534         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
01535     R_CheckStack();
01536     
01537     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01538     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
01539     for (int i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
01540     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01541         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
01542         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
01543             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
01544             for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
01545                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
01546             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
01547         }
01548     }
01549     return R_NilValue;
01550 }
01551 
01561 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
01562 {
01563     int npar = DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS];
01564 
01565     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
01566         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
01567     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
01568     return R_NilValue;
01569 }
01570 
01578 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01579 {
01580     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01581     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01582 
01583     d[disc_POS] = MUETA_SLOT(x) ?
01584         lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x), PWT_SLOT(x), Y_SLOT(x),
01585                       dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]) :
01586         d[wrss_POS];
01587     d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01588     return R_NilValue;
01589 }

01605 }

01617 SEXP mer_update_mu(SEXP x)

01620 }

01633 SEXP mer_update_u(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01634 {

01636 }

01648 SEXP mer_update_ranef(SEXP x)
01649 {
01650     update_ranef(x);
01651     return R_NilValue;
01652 }

01662 mer_update_RX(SEXP x)
01663 {

01666 
01667 SEXP merMCMC_VarCorr(SEXP x, SEXP typP)
01668 {
01669     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01670         ncs = GET_SLOT(x, install("nc"));
01671     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *Sd = INTEGER(GET_DIM(ST)), *nc = INTEGER(ncs);
01672     int maxnc = 0, nf = LENGTH(ncs), np = Sd[0], nsamp = Sd[1], pos;
01673     double *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym);
01674     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nsamp, np + (sig ? 1 : 0)));
01675     double *av = REAL(ans), *STx = REAL(ST);
01676     double *as = av + nsamp * np, *t1, *t2, var;
01677     int *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01678     R_CheckStack();
01679 
01680     for (int j = 0; j < nf; j++) {
01681         nlev[j] = (Gp[j + 1] - Gp[j])/nc[j];
01682         if (maxnc < nc[j]) maxnc = nc[j];
01683     }
01684     if (maxnc > 1) {
01685         t1 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01686         t2 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01687         R_CheckStack();
01688     }
01689     
01690     for (int i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01691         var = 1; pos = 0;
01692         if (sig) var = as[i] = sig[i] * sig[i];
01693         for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
01694             if (nc[k] < 2) {
01695                 double sd = STx[pos + i * np] * sig[i];
01696                 av[i + nsamp * pos++] = sd * sd;
01697             }
01698             else error(_("Code not yet written"));
01699         }
01700     }
01701         
01702     UNPROTECT(1);
01703     return ans;
01704 }
01713 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01714 {
01715     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01716         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01717         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01718         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01719         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym), asgnP;
01720     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP), *asgn;
01721     int n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, nfl,
01722         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01723     int nv = n * s;
01724     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x), A =  A_SLOT(x);
01725     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01726     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01727     R_CheckStack();
01728                                 /* check lengths */
01729     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01730         return mkString(_("Slot ST must have length dims['nf']"));
01731     asgnP = getAttrib(flistP, install("assign"));
01732     if (!isInteger(asgnP) || LENGTH(asgnP) != nf)
01733         return mkString(_("Slot flist must have integer attribute 'assign' of length dims['nf']"));
01734     asgn = INTEGER(asgnP);
01735     nfl = LENGTH(flistP);
01736     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++)
01737         if (asgn[i] <= 0 || asgn[i] > nfl)
01738             return mkString(_("All elements of the assign attribute must be in [1,length(ST)]"));
01739     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01740         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01741     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01742         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01743     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01744         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01745         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01746     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01747         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01748         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01749     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01750         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01751     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01752         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01753     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01754         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01755     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01756     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01757     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01758     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01759     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01760     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01761     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01762     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01763     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01764     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01765     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01766     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01767     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01768     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01769     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01770     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01771 
01772     nq = 0;
01773     for (int i = 0; i < LENGTH(flistP); i++) {
01774         SEXP fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01775         if (!isFactor(fli))
01776             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01777 /*      nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol)); */
01778     }
01779     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01780         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
01781         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01782         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01783             return
01784                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01785         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01786             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01787     }
01788 #if 0
01789 /* FIXME: Need to incorporate the assign attribute in the calculation of nq */
01790     if (q != nq)
01791         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01792 #endif
01793     return ScalarLogical(1);
01794 }
01795 
01804 SEXP merMCMC_validate(SEXP x)
01805 {
01806     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01807         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01808         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym);
01809     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01810     int nf = dd[nf_POS], np = dd[np_POS], nsamp = LENGTH(devianceP),
01811         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS];
01812     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01813     R_CheckStack();
01814                                 /* check lengths */
01815     if (nsamp <= 0)
01816         return mkString(_("number of samples must be positive"));
01817     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01818         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01819         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01820     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01821         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01822     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01823         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01824 
01825     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ncSym, nf, 0))
01826         return(mkString(buf));
01827     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sigmaSym, nsamp, !dd[useSc_POS]))
01828         return(mkString(buf));
01829     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_STSym, np, nsamp))
01830         return(mkString(buf));
01831     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, nsamp))
01832         return(mkString(buf));
01833     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)))
01834         if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, nsamp))
01835             return(mkString(buf));
01836     return ScalarLogical(1);
01837 }
01838 
01847 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01848 {
01849     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01850     int n = dims[n_POS];
01851     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = Calloc(n, double), *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01852         *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01853         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
01854     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01855     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01856         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01857     R_CheckStack();
01858     
01859     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01860     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01861         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01862     lme4_muEta(mu, MUETA_SLOT(x), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01863     lme4_varFunc(VAR_SLOT(x), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01864 
01865     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01866     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01867         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01868         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01869     }
01870 
01871     Free(eta);
01872     return R_NilValue;
01873 }
01874 
01875 
01886 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01887 {
01888     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01889     double *Zcp, *Ztx, *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01890         *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01891         *pWt = PWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
01892         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *tmp, *tmp2,
01893         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), cfac, crit,
01894         one[] = {1, 0}, step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01895     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01896     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01897     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01898     R_CheckStack();
01899     
01900     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01901     m = Zt->nrow;
01902     n = Zt->ncol;
01903     nnz = zp[n];
01904     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01905     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01906     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01907     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01908     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01909     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01910     R_CheckStack();
01911 
01912     spR_update_mu(x);
01913     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01914         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01915         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01916             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01917             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01918             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01919             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01920                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01921         }
01922         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01923         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01924             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01925                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01926         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01927                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
01928         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01929         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
01930         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
01931                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01932         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01933             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01934         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01935         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01936                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01937         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
01938         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01939                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01940         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01941             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01942         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01943         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01944 
01945         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
01946         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01947             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
01948             spR_update_mu(x);
01949             if (verb < 0)
01950                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01951                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
01952             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
01953                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01954                 break;
01955             }
01956         }
01957         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01958     }
01959     Free(tmp2);
01960     Free(Zcp);
01961     Free(tmp);
01962     return R_NilValue;
01963 }

02018 static void
02019 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
02020 {
02021     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
02022     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
02023         *w = Alloca(n, double),
02024         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
02025 
02026     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
02027     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
02028     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
02029     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
02030         int i, np1 = n + 1;
02031         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
02032         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
02033     }
02034 }
02035 
02045 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals)
02046 {
02047     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
02048     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS], pos = 0;
02049     double *Ptu = Calloc(q, double), *u = U_SLOT(x);
02050     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
02051     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
02052     R_CheckStack();
02053 
02054     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
02055                                 /* inverse permutation of u */
02056     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) Ptu[perm[j]] = u[j];
02057 
02058     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
02059         int qi = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
02060         double *sti = st[i], *ui = Ptu + Gp[i];
02061 
02062         if (qi == 1) {
02063             *sti *= sqrt(sqr_length(ui, nl)/rchisq((double)nl))/sigma;
02064             vals[pos++] = *sti;
02065         } else {
02066             int info, qisq = qi * qi, qip1 = qi + 1;
02067             double invsigsq = 1/(sigma * sigma), one[] = {1,0}, zer[] = {0,0};
02068 
02069             double *scal = Alloca(qisq, double), *tmp = Alloca(qisq, double);
02070             R_CheckStack();
02071                                 /* scal := crossprod(U_i)/sigma^2 */
02072             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &nl, &invsigsq, ui, &nl,
02073                             zer, scal, &qi); 
02074             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, scal, &qi, &info);
02075             if (info)
02076                 error(_("scal matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
02077             /* solve W_i' B_i = R_i for W_i a random std Wishart factor */
02078             F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "L", "T", "N", &qi, &qi, one,
02079                             std_rWishart_factor((double)(nl - qi + 1), qi, 0, tmp),
02080                             &qi, scal, &qi);
02081                                 /* B_i := T(theta) %*% S(theta) %*% B_i */
02082             for (int k = 0; k < qi; k++)
02083                 for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
02084                     scal[j * qi + k] *= st[i][k * qip1];
02085             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", &qi, &qi, one, st[i], &qi, scal, &qi);
02086                                 /* Create the lower Cholesky factor */
02087             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &qi, one, scal, &qi, zer, tmp, &qi); 
02088             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, tmp, &qi, &info);
02089             if (info)
02090                 error(_("crossproduct matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
02091                                 /* Update S_i and T_i */
02092             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++) vals[pos++] = sti[j * qip1] = tmp[j * qip1];
02093             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
02094                 for (int k = j + 1; k < qi; k++)
02095                     vals[pos++] = sti[j * qi + k] = tmp[j * qi + k]/sti[j * qip1];
02096         }
02097     }
02098     update_A(x);
02099     Free(Ptu);
02100 }
02101 
02102 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
02103 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
02104 
02117 static double
02118 *std_rWishart_factor(double nu, int p, int upper, double ans[])
02119 {
02120     int pp1 = p + 1;
02121 
02122     if (nu < (double) p || p <= 0)
02123         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
02124 
02125     AZERO(ans, p * p);
02126     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) {       /* jth column */
02127         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(nu - (double) j));
02128         for (int i = 0; i < j; i++) {
02129             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
02130                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
02131             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
02132             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
02133         }
02134     }
02135     return ans;
02136 }
02137 
02147 SEXP
02148 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP nuP, SEXP scal)
02149 {
02150     SEXP ans;
02151     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), info,
02152         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
02153     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, nu = asReal(nuP), one = 1, zero = 0;
02154 
02155     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
02156         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
02157     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
02158     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
02159     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
02160     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
02161     R_CheckStack();
02162 
02163     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
02164     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
02165     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &info);
02166     if (info)
02167         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
02168     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
02169     ansp = REAL(ans);
02170     GetRNGstate();
02171     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
02172         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
02173         std_rWishart_factor(nu, dims[0], 1, tmp);
02174         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
02175                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
02176         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
02177                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
02178                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
02179 
02180         for (int i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
02181             for (int k = 0; k < i; k++)
02182                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
02183     }
02184 
02185     PutRNGstate();
02186     UNPROTECT(1);
02187     return ans;
02188 }
02189 
02190 
02203 static R_INLINE double*
02204 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
02205 {
02206     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
02207     return dest;
02208 }
